p: However, from 520 to 691 s, a thin nanowire with uniform diameter was produced, as shown in Fig. 2e–g. During this stage of uniform growth, the region at the bottom part of the nanowire is boxed in the red rectangle, which is enlarged to pixel resolution in the inset in Fig. 2e. The pixel measurement results indicate that a neck-shaped ligament, with characteristic height h ~50 nm and an apparent diameter of Φ n = 7 nm in its narrowest part, was formed, whereas the uniform part of nanowire has a much larger apparent diameter Φ w = 40 nm.
